dc_title_s: The gold and coal fields of Alaska : together with the principal steamer routes and trails
dc_description_s: Relief shown in hachures.; Includes parts of the Yukon Territory and northern British Columbia.; Includes 2 inset maps: The Klondike gold field, Canada -- Trails from Tide Water to the headwaters of the Yukon River, Alaska.; Accompanied by: Map of Alaska : showing known gold-bearing rocks ... Washington, D.C. : United States Geological Survey, 1898. 44 pages.|60 x 73 centimeters|Scale 1:3,600,000 "about 57 miles to one inch"
